page.description: Creates a duplicate of a set

argument.name: source_set
argument.description: The name of the set to duplicate.

argument.name: target_set
argument.description: The name of the new set.

page.discussion: The A5_DUPLICATE_SET_FILES() function copies the .SEM, .SET, and .SEX components of a set. If the target files exist already, it adds the records of the original set to the target set.
